title: "U.S. judge warns law firms in Clearview AI lawsuit over 'disarray'"
excerpt: "Law firm Loevy & Loevy will remain as co-lead counsel in a proposed class action against facial recognition startup Clearview AI Inc, a Chicago federal judge said this week, after a split between the firm and one of its former lawyers created \"disarray\" over their roles in the case."
